lead_paragraph: A. J. Allmendinger, the only driver from the United States in the Champ Car series, helped celebrate the 25th anniversary of the Grand Prix of Cleveland by setting a track record yesterday. Allmendinger won the pole for today's race with a lap of 56.283 seconds at 134.705 miles an hour. Jimmy Vasser had held the qualifying record, 56.417 seconds and 134.385 m.p.h., since 1998.
